javelin.controller.action

Class TouchAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.target.Target
        • javelin.controller.action.Fire
          • javelin.controller.action.TouchAttack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction

    public class TouchAttack
extends Fire
implements AiAction
    An attack that reaches out only 5 feet, like from the Digester or Shocker Lizard.
    Author:
    alex
